title: [MAC] Disconnected from Chat after each game. Have to relog to start a new one.
body:
My connection is fine from when I start the client all the way through 100% of the game each time. It ONLY disconnects after the game has concluded and I click "continue" 

Anyone having this issue? Any ideas for a fix?

replies.body: I have the same problem. I've just installed League of Legends and it disconnects cca every minute. Dialog window with text: "_Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out._" It is also disconnected after finishing the match and I can't see my final stats, give honor, see my grade or whatever in summary screen, I have to click "_Skip waiting for stats_" button. Almost after every game, I have to relog because I can't receive any game invitation requests or I can't see my champion mastery levels in my profile. Any ideas? Thank you.
